0.1.name: wordpress/cr-flexible-comment-moderation
0.1.description: A wordpress plugin that will allow you to flexibly set comment moderation mode on individual post, wether to automatically approve or moderate the comment. Useful if you want to post a sensitive post where you want to moderate all comment on that post while allow comment on other post to auto approve. Btw, I created a step by step tutorial on how to build this plugin here.
